name: Operation Darkness
description:
Operation Darkness is a RPG-strategy game developed by Success. It was originally released in 2007. Atlus published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Operation Darkness is available on Xbox 360.
It was produced by Ken Ogura. Hisakazu Masubuchi directed the game. It was scored by Kazushi Tsurukubo, Kenichi Arakawa and Tetsurō Satō.
